broadcastMessages.title: Stop Bern, Bahnhof, stops A, B, C moved
broadcastMessages.detail:
The stop Bern, Bahnhof, stops A, B, C has been moved.
This is due to a natural hazard.
The restriction lasts from 15.10.2023, 14:18 until 31.12.2023, 20:00.
Lines 7, 8 and 9 are affected.
Es kann längere Umsteigezeiten geben..
Please observe the local signals.
The online timetable has been changed.
broadcastMessages.detailShort:
Stop Bern, Bahnhof, stops A, B, C moved
Due to natural hazard
